name: Accurate Angels
description:
(Game is a little unfinished but still fully playable with main core gameplay loop)

Fight through angels, to prove that you are the ultimate definition of an ACCURATE ANGEL! Will, you succeed? Or will you perish! It is up to you! It's actually a pretty simple game, just wanted to humor you, hehe! Good luck!

Made for GameJam 70: Heaven

Estimated completion time: ~10 minutes

Controls: WASD to move.

Game by:
Programming: https://clementinefruity.itch.io/

Art by: https://alpineshowtime.itch.io/

SFX + Music: Public Domain
